summary: Retexture of the Gold Septim Coin
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=36][color= FF4500]M17 Septim coin retexture[/color][/size][/b][/center]
[center][img] http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/2933/coingp.jpg [/img][/center]
If you like this mod, please come back and  [color=red]ENDORSE[/color]

[u]Description:[/u]
Two version to download. One golden and one copperish color.

This is another retexture of the Septim. I know there is few already, but this is my first mod ever and I just wanted to share it with you.I took a photo of the real Septim coin and made the texture from it. Hope someone will like it.

[u]Installation:[/u]
To install it, just copy the folder in your skyrim game folder. 
To uninstall it, delete the coin01.dds and coin01_n.dds files from your Skyrim/Data/Textures/clutter folder

Big thanks to Crypton, who was a great help and who btw also made his own version of the coin (much more detailed than me).


[u]My other mods:[/u]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4201]Glass armor and weapon set[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3239]Light Blue Elven armor and weapon set[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4635]Dark Elven weapon and armor set[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3362]Glass  weapon and armor set with blue moonstone[/url]
author: Malkav17
